content.raw:
Joshua,

‌

Many thanks for your help. It works! I use the time library and there is no time for cparser.isoforms. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/7BxBr/images/326360550-image.png)
Using Bovine Serum Albumin and several variable modifications the parser.isoforms time increased 10x, while cparser.isoforms remained the same. 

I am very grateful! Next step is to implement in to my research scripts.

Carolina
